title: Netflix Clone
description: A Netflix clone built with React, Material UI, and TMDB API. It features user authentication, movie browsing, and a responsive design for an engaging user experience.
demo: notAvailable:(Demo is not available bec. production issues)

title: Admin Dashboard
description: this is a React Admin Dashboard template using Material UI components and React Router for navigation. It includes various features such as charts, calendars, and forms to manage data effectively.

title: Todo list
description: this is a todo list app using React js and Matrial UI i was learning in it all the react concepts i this is the concepts and tools that i did it in the this project : useState, useEffect, useMemo, useContexts and reducers and  more. check blow the source code to see what i did .

title: Interactive nested comments section (CRUD)
description: this is a Interactive  nested comments section has all (CRUD) operations create, read, update, delete and reply to comments  it was hard to loop over nested array i used recursion concept to solve this problem i will inegrate it in my courses platform using react js i will add limitation for the replies ui in the small screens by the way it was  a broject from frontend mentor website (www.frontendmentor.io)

title: Image processor
description: this is a JavaScript Image Editor using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS it has a lot of features like crop, rotate, flip, adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, and more and  i learned a lot of things in this project about the canvas element in html and how to manipulate images using javascript. yes it has some ui problems but its still great.

title: Browser extensions manager UI
description: this is a Browser extensions manager UI using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS it has a lot of features like add, delete and fillteration buttons to show  all, active and non active extention and responsive design it has dark and light mode option. the project from frontend mentor website (www.frontendmentor.io)

title: Real Social media app  (mini facebook)
description: this is my first big project This is a simple social media web app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to register, log in, and create, edit, or delete posts with images.Data is managed using Axios to communicate with a REST API from the Backend .The app supports user authentication, dynamic post display, and infinitescrolling.
